value.title: China bans foreign visitors after imported coronavirus cases rise
value.excerpt: China will ban entry to all foreigners, including non-nationals with valid visas and residence permits, from midnight on Friday in a move to curb the numbers of imported coronavirus cases. The other measures announced by the foreign ministry include reducing the number of international flights and limiting the capacity on board to 75 percent.

images.title: China bans foreign visitors after imported coronavirus cases rise

value.title: U.S. Increases Support for Taiwan, China Threatens to Strike Back
value.excerpt: U.S. President Donald Trump has signed into law an act that requires increased U.S. support for Taiwan internationally, prompting a denunciation by China, which said it would strike back if the law was implemented.

images.title: U.S. Increases Support for Taiwan, China Threatens to Strike Back

value.title: Exclusive: Support for Hong Kong protesters' demands rises even as coronavirus halts rallies: poll
value.excerpt: Support for the demands of pro-democracy protesters in Hong Kong has grown even as rallies have paused due to the coronavirus outbreak, according to a survey conducted for Reuters that also showed a widespread lack of confidence in the government's ability to manage the COVID-19 crisis.

images.title: Exclusive: Support for Hong Kong protesters' demands rises even as coronavirus halts rallies: poll

value.title: As coronavirus cases spike worldwide, China is closing itself off
value.excerpt: China is closing its border to most foreigners amid fears of imported novel coronavirus cases causing a second outbreak in the country where the infection was first detected.

images.title: As coronavirus cases spike worldwide, China is closing itself off

value.title: America Now Has More Coronavirus Cases Than China

value.title: Trump says the US and China are 'working closely together' in fight against coronavirus
value.excerpt: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday he spoke with his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping and discussed "in great detail" about the coronavirus pandemic, which has so far killed more than 24,000 people globally.

value.title: Italy's coronavirus death toll is more than double that of China's — this might be why

value.title: Quarantine a boon for some Hong Kong hotels as thousands return
value.excerpt: As thousands of Hong Kong citizens and expatriates return to the city, many are seeking refuge in hotels, fearful that cramped apartments in one of the world’s most expensive property markets could put families or flatmates at risk.

value.title: Coronavirus travel: China bars foreign visitors as imported cases rise

value.title: U.S. Surpasses China In Cases Of Coronavirus
value.excerpt: The number of people with coronavirus in the U.S. has surpassed the number of cases being reported by China. According to data compiled by Johns Hopkins University, the U.S. has 82,404 cases as of 6 p.m. ET Thursday, while China has reported about 81,800 cases. In China, where the epidemic started in December, almost 3,300 people have died ...

value.title: U.S. Coronavirus Cases Surpass Those of China, Italy
value.excerpt: The U.S. has overtaken China as the country with the most novel coronavirus cases in the world, marking a new milestone in the fight against the global pandemic.
